name: "Synchromism" CD
description:
Full length debut album Synchromism on CD. Why a CD?
  • Still the industry standard for highest sound quality.
  • Create your own (DRM-free) digital copies whenever you feel like.
  • Real artwork you get to hold in your hands and fondle.
  • Greater sense of music ownership.
  • Immune to hard-drive crashes and other catastrophes.
  • You can display your CD collection prominently in the room, allowing your friends to easily observe how much more awesome your musical taste is than theirs.
  • Yes, I would be happy to sign your copy for you. Just let me know in the notes when you checkout.
